interpreter

Class CommandAdd

  • java.lang.Object
    • interpreter.Command
      • interpreter.CommandAdd

  • public class CommandAdd
extends Command
    Class for Add command, which contains task name, 2 sets of date and time, a list of tags and boolean variable to indicate missing arguments.
    Author:
    SP

      • Fields inherited from class interpreter.Command

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandAdd

        public CommandAdd(java.lang.String newTaskName,
          java.util.Calendar newStartDate,
          java.util.Calendar newEndDate,
          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newTags,
          java.lang.String userInput,
          boolean hasMissingArgs)
        Constructor for the Add command object. It is initialised with a task name, start date and time, end date and time, a list of tags and a boolean variable to indicate if there are missing arguments.
        Parameters:
        newTaskName - the task name of the new add command
        newStartDate - the starting date and time of the task to add
        newEndDate - the ending date and time of the task to add
        newTags - the list of tags associated with the new add command
        hasMissingArgs - boolean variable to indicate missing arguments

    • Method Detail

      • getTaskName

        public java.lang.String getTaskName()
        Accessor for task name of the new task
        Returns:
        the name of the task to be added

      • getStartDate

        Accessor for starting date and time of the new task
        Returns:
        starting date and time of the task to be added

      • getEndDate

        public java.util.Calendar getEndDate()
        Accessor for ending date and time of the new task
        Returns:
        ending date and time of the task to be added

      • getTags

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTags()
        Accessor for tags of the new task
        Returns:
        an arraylist of the tags of the task to be added
